attributes.action: Consider Lewis Hamilton, five times Formula 1 World Champion, for a Knighthood.
attributes.additional_details: Lewis Hamilton has quite exceptionally 'flown the flag' for Great Britain all around the World winning five World Championships.
attributes.background: Sir Stirling Moss and Sir Jackie Stewart are examples.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because it asks for someone to be nominated for an honour. 

Members of the public can nominate people for honours directly. You can find out how to nominate someone for an honour here:

https://www.gov.uk/honours
